summary: Always perform killing blows when an enemy is near death.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Edited by zcul (moderator) on 07 December 2017:
[/size]
Mod author’s comment 06 July 2013, 20:54 hrs:
[b][size=4]„For anyone still viewing this mod. It's obsolete. This was asmall configuration I made which was changed with every patch since then. It will not work anymore. I don't have any intention on updating it at this time. This is because of my current work load
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37855/? this is the mod I am working on
currently, and I don't think I'll be working on others in the meantime.“[/size]

[/b][b]
[/b]

100% Killing blow chance when an enemy is near death.

> You do not have to use the console to set this value.
> You can use the console to change the value of killermoverandom as this is not a constant value.
> This can be used with any mods.
author: Ice9000
